title: Airy Fairy Lillian Tries on Her New Corsets

sources.title: "Airy Fairy Lillian Tries On Her New Corsets" (1905) cinematographer Billy Bitzer
sources.description: This gem is presented by Silent Hall of Fame.   Please visit https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/   to support our non-profit mission and the legacy of silent movie stars by making a tax deductible contribution.   FEEL FREE TO FOLLOW US ON TWITTER @SilentFilmGems     This is a short preview. You can watch the whole film here: https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/index.php/gems-for-donation   "Airy Fairy Lillian Tries on Her New Corsets" is a very short comedy with unknown cast and director.  The film is included in our program to illustrate the work of our star Billy Bitzer. Young Lillian has trouble putting on her new corsets.  Will she get some help in her predicament? Directed by                       unknown Cinematography by         Billy Bitzer Starring                             unknown Distributed by                   Biograph Company Release date                      November 3, 1905 Country                             United States Running time                    1 m.   Copyright Disclaimer Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976: "Allowance is made for "fair use" for purposes such as criticism, comment, news reporting, teaching, scholarship, and research. Fair use is a use permitted by copyright statute that might otherwise be infringing. Non-profit, educational or personal use tips the balance in favor of fair use."

sources.title: Airy Fairy Lillian Tries on Her New Corsets

metadata.Plot: A very large woman, wearing a shift, stands beside a bed and tries to put on a corset. After failing to get it around her, she calls her husband in. He stands behind her holding the corset and reaches around her so she can grasp and begin to tie it in front. He tightens the laces in back. She's done, and he's done in, collapsing onto the bed as she laughs and laughs at him.
